issue.title: [Integration] Add integration tests for Binary / Varbytes type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-476](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-476). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
String / UTF8 varbytes is being tested, but not the (equivalent, metadata aside) Binary type

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-476?focusedCommentId=15859672) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 326
